Articles.Content:
When I try to set up a custom action group, I don't get any numbers. I see "stage" through "abort" but no "custom 1" through "custom 9".

Very new to this game, so it might be an experience issue rather than a bug, but I just can't find any solution to this. Help?
You don't get full access to custom action groups until the VAB is upgraded to at least level 2 or 3 in Career mode, if that's the mode you're playing in.

...Oh.

Lots of things about career mode that aren't spelled out. Sorry!
